basic_info.description: ðŸ‘‹ I'm Abdulahi Mohamud. I am a full-stack software engineer who specializes in Javascript, I also have a  background in cyber security. A bit about my experience, I worked for Amazon security and have been working there for almost 3 years. I have many responsibilities from access control for a highrise building. I also work with big teams to help keep the area secure, this helps develops my teamwork skills. Im currently balancing that with my passion for and that is coding. Coding to me is the power to create my own world. I have acquired many skills and experiences such as critical thinking, and self-learning, and implemented those in projects and code challenges. I am in love with coding and I would like to encourage others who have an interest in software development and be not only a mentor but also a symbol of hard work and dedication pays off

projects.title: BussMall
projects.description: In this project we needed to create a picture survey that will record the results of favored products, the results were then integrated into a visual bar graph for data analysis.

projects.title: Salmon Stand
projects.description: On this web page, the use of tables in HTML is used to simulate potential data for a possible business.

projects.title: Open-source FlashCards
projects.description: created a webpage that helps make learning or studing a new language easier by making flash cards that help with memorization. The user can also create their own cards or what we call decks to help suite their needs at the time. This can also help teacher or instructor in their class to be a more fun and exciting way of teaching!
